page.title: 11Lochore Meadows Activities
page.content: At the Meadows, there are several organisations for naturalists, mainly {Friends of Lochore Meadows,}the junior {Meadies Midgies}and{Project Peewit.} Every Sunday during the summer the Fife Ranger Service organises guided walks in the area. One day this year, everyone at the Meadows helped to build animal homes around the park.We made homes for bats hedgehogs,kestrels and swallows.In the forest, we built small animal cairns out of flat stones. The kestrel box was put up the disused Mary Pit wheel. It was so high that the help of the Fire Brigade had to be enlisted! There is a 12 minute slide show on the reclamation of Lochore Meadows. Other activities include golfing,horse riding,putting,canoeing, sailing, windsurfing and fishing. Gordon Grant (10) and classmates.
